items.title: Software stocks: Morgan Staley sees improving outlook for front office
items.description: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley analysts told investors in a note Monday that spending on front office software is poised to accelerate in 2025, supported by waning cyclical headwinds and growing enterprise interest in generative AI.

items.title: Coveo Will Join the Expansion of AgentExchange with MCP Servers, Accelerating AI Adoption for Enterprises
items.description: Coveo (TSX: CVO), the leader in AI-Relevance, delivering best-in-class AI-search and generative experiences that maximize business outcomes at every point-of-experience, today announced the expansion of its partnership with Salesforce and its collaboration with Salesforce for MCP Server on AgentExchange, further enhancing the ability of AI agents to access relevant, accurate, and secure enterprise data through a standardized protocol. items.title: Wall Street Lunch: Copper Import Duties Could Disrupt U.S. Auto Market
items.description: Wells Fargo dove into the implications for the auto sector of the Trump Administration imposing a 50% tariff on copper imports from select countries.
